data.title: 220 Riola Place , Pensacola, FL 32506 - #345699
data.meta_description: , ,  Land located at 220 Riola Place  Pensacola FL 32506 US MLS #345699
data.text: 220 Riola Place Welcome to your very own waterfront oasis on Riola Place in Pensacola, FL! This stunning vacant lot boasts an outstanding 728 feet of water frontage on Perdido Bay and covers 43.94 acres of prime real estate. With no HOA to worry about, you have complete freedom to create the perfect living space to suit your needs and desires. Zoned for medium density residential use, this lot offers endless possibilities for those looking to build their dream bay house or boater's paradise. With such a vast expanse of land to work with, you have plenty of room to let your imagination run wild and create a truly unique and personalized living space. But the real magic of this location lies in its serene and secluded surroundings. Whether you're looking to escape the hustle and bustle of city life or simply enjoy some peace and quiet, this property offers the perfect setting for relaxation and rejuvenation. Despite its tranquil location, this lot is still conveniently located just a short drive away from Perdido Key, Orange Beach, Lillian, and Downtown Pensacola! Whether you prefer to explore by boat or by car, you'll have quick access to fun spots like Pirate's Cove and Flora-Bama Yacht Club. Don't miss your chance to own this truly exceptional piece of real estate. Start planning your dream waterfront retreat! Buyer to verify all information during due diligence.
